Question.Subject: i opened an unpaid item case on ebay, if the buyer still does not pay, does ebay pay me the money?
Question.Content: 8 days ago, a buyer, with a fake name and address, unfortunately won my item on eBay for £26.00. he still hasn't paid, despite the fact i opened an unpaid items case against him 4 days ago, I was wondering, if i close the case, do i receive a payment for the £26.00 from eBay?
Question.ChosenAnswer: unfortunately ebay sellers have little or no rights ( i am an ebay seller and i get unpaid items about 5 times each month). all ebay will do is credit your fees, you will have to relist the item or give a second chance offer to the second highest bidder. the non paying winner will recieve a strike on their account.....but this basically makes little difference......I HATE EBAY. hope this helps

Answer.Content:
No. Why would or should eBay pay?
If the guy doesn't pay, you don't ship. Simple as.
